meanings.definition: Glucosamines: substances that are naturally found in the fluid around joints and are commonly used as a dietary supplement for joint health.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended taking glucosamines to support my joints.
meanings.sent2: Many people take glucosamines to help keep their joints healthy.
meanings.sent3: I sprinkled some glucosamines on my breakfast cereal for extra joint support.
meanings.sent4: Her joints felt like they were dancing happily after taking glucosamines.
meanings.sent5: The glucosamines flowed through his joints like a soothing river, easing any discomfort.
